definition: to give a tendency to : incline
examples: faulty diet disposes one to sickness

definition: to put in place : set in readiness : arrange
to get rid of, to deal with conclusively
examples: how to dispose of toxic waste

definition: to transfer to the control of another
examples: disposing of personal property to a total stranger

definition: to place, distribute, or arrange especially in an orderly way
examples: disposing of the weapons in the new fort
